entry.source: 〉 The door won't open.{F801}It seems to be locked.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The door won't open.{F801}It seems to be locked.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A key has been left inserted into{F801}the door. Open the door's lock?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A key has been left inserted into{F801}the door. Open the door's lock?{F801}

entry.source: Open the lock{F801}Don't open the lock{F801}
entry.target: Open the lock{F801}Don't open the lock{F801}

entry.source: 〉 You sense many Gaea followers beyond{F801}the door...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 You sense many Gaea followers beyond{F801}the door...{F801}
